title: Q
description: A man buys a young girl, code-names her "Doll" and sends her to live with a mother of two who has a mysterious mission to be fulfilled.
actors: Heeba Shah, Ashwin Shukla, Muskaan, Aldan Shaikh

title: Qarib Qarib Singlle
description: After reluctantly joining a dating app, a 35-year-old widow accompanies an easygoing poet on a trip to visit three of his exes.
actors: Irrfan Khan, Parvathy, Neha Dhupia, Pushtii Shakti

title: Qila
description: When an abusive landowner is murdered, his twin brother sets out to find the killer but quickly discovers that everyone, it seems, wanted him dead.
actors: Dilip Kumar, Mukul Dev, Rekha, Mamta Kulkarni

title: Queen
description: A jilted bride decides to go on her European honeymoon anyway -- by herself -- and ends up embarking on a journey of self-discovery.
actors: Kangana Ranaut, Rajkummar Rao, Lisa Haydon, Mish Boyko

title: Quiet Victory: The Charlie Wedemeyer Story
description: When high school football coach Charlie Wedemeyer is diagnosed with Lou Gehrig's disease, he perseveres in leading his team despite becoming disabled.
actors: Pam Dawber, Michael Nouri, Bess Meyer, Peter Berg

title: Quiz Show
description: Robert Redford directs this true story of Charles Van Doren, who rocketed to national fame as a repeat winner on the TV quiz show "Twenty-One."
actors: John Turturro, Rob Morrow, Ralph Fiennes, David Paymer
